comments:
Build ID: 3.2.1

Steps To Reproduce:
1. create some managed build C projects
2. use the workspace for some time (stop/start workbench)
3. lots of exceptions appears in the error log

When using the CDT for a while (a week) we are experiencing lots of exceptions of type
"Exception occurred while saving project preferences"
with the message "The resource tree is locked for modifications" in the log.

More information:
